sen.j: 平安神宮前駅（へいあんじんぐうまええき）は、京都市東山区にあった鉄道駅。
sen.e: Heianjingu-mae Station was a railway station located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Heianjingu-mae Station was a railway station located in Kyoto City's Higashiyama Ward.
sen.cmt: Inserted "the", deleted comma, changed "Higashiyama Ward of Kyoto City" to "Kyoto City's Higashiyama Ward".
sen.e: Heianjingu-mae Station was a railway station located in Kyoto City's Higashiyama Ward.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 京阪電気鉄道（廃止当時は阪急電鉄）京阪京津線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: It was a station of Keihan Keishin Line of Keihan Denki Tetsudo (Keihan Railway) which was Keihanshin Kyuko Dentetsu (Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company) at the time when the station was abolished).
sen.cmt: ①一原文一訳文の例外対処 ②原文の「阪急電鉄」を「京阪神急行電鉄」に訂正して訳しました。理由は、当駅の廃止時点（1944年）の鉄道名は「阪急電鉄」ではなく「京阪神急行電鉄」であったため。参考までに、1943年10月に旧京阪電気鉄道（former Keihan Railway)と旧阪急（阪神急行）とが合併して京阪神急行電鉄（Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company)となった。その後、1949年に再度分割され、現在の京阪電気鉄道（株）（Keihan Electric Railway Co., Ltd.)が京津線を引き継いだ。（http://74.125.153.132/search?q=cache:yW5BRrSn1ZEJ:www.facebook.com/group.php%3Fgid%3D25648150664+Keihanshin+Express+Electric+Railway&cd=1&hl=ja&ct=clnk&gl=jp）
sen.e: The station belonged to the Keihan Keishin Line of Keihan Denki Tetsudo (Keihan Railway), which was known as Keihanshin Kyuko Dentetsu (Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company) at the time of the station's closure.
sen.cmt: Changed "it was a station of" to "the station belonged to", inserted "the", inserted comma, inserted "known as", changed "when the station was abolished" to "of the station's closure".
sen.e: The station belonged to the Keihan Keishin Line of the Keihan Railway Company, which was known as Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company at the time of the station's closure.
sen.cmt: 京阪電気鉄道→the Keihan Railway Company としました。京阪神急行電鉄→Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company としました。

tit.cmt: コロンを削除しました。

sen.j: 1912年（大正元年）8月15日 京津電気軌道開業時に応天門駅として開業。
sen.e: On August 15, 1912, when Keishin Denki-kido (Keishin Electric Tramway) was established, Otenmon Station was opened.
sen.cmt: 「京津電気軌道」の正式英文名不詳
sen.e: On August 15, 1912 (the first year of the Taisho era), the Keishin Denki-kido (Keishin Electric Tramway) was established and the station was opened as Otenmon Station.
sen.cmt: Inserted "(the first year of the Taisho era), inserted "when the", changed "Otenmon Station was opened"to "and the station was opened as Otenmon Station".
sen.e: August 15, 1912: The Keishin Electric Tramway was established and the station was opened as Otenmon Station.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロンの表現にしました。京津電気軌道→Keishin Electric Tramway としました。

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）7月1日 駅名を神宮道駅に改称。
sen.e: On July 1, 1928, the name of station was changed to Jingu-michi Station.
sen.cmt: 「神宮道駅」の正式英文名不詳
sen.e: On July 1, 1928, the station's name was changed to Jingu-michi Station.
sen.cmt: Changed "name of station" to "station's name".
sen.e: July 1, 1928: The station's name was changed to Jingu-michi Station.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロンの表現にしました。

sen.j: 1931年（昭和6年）2月20日 三条通上の併用軌道に移設される。
sen.e: On February 20, 1931, it was relocated to the tramway of combined use on Sanjo-dori Street.
On February 20, 1931, it was relocated to the combined use tramway on Sanjo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Changed "tramway of combined use" to "combined use tramway".
sen.e: February 20, 1931: It was relocated to the combined use tramway on Sanjo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロンの表現にしました。

sen.j: 1941年（昭和16年）駅名を平安神宮前に改称。
sen.e: In 1941, it was renamed to Heianjingu-mae.
In 1941, it was renamed "Heianjingu-mae".
sen.cmt: Deleted "to", inserted quote marks.
sen.e: 1941: It was renamed Heianjingu-mae Station.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロンの表現にしました。

sen.e: In 1944, it was abolished.
In 1944, it was closed.
sen.cmt: Changed "abolished" to "closed".
sen.e: 1944: The station was closed.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロンの表現にしました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と合わせました。

sen.e: Keihanshin Kyuko Dentetsu (Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company):
Keihanshin Kyuko Dentetsu (Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company):
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company
sen.cmt: コロンを削除しました。京阪神急行電鉄→Keihanshin Kyuko Railway Company としました。

sen.e: Keishin Line:
Keishin Line:
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Keishin Line
sen.cmt: コロンを削除しました。

sen.j: 東山三条駅 - 平安神宮前駅 - （岡崎道駅） - 蹴上駅 (京阪)
sen.e: Higashiyama-Sanjo Station -- Heianjingu-mae Station -- (Okazaki-michi Station) -- Keage Station (Keihan)
Higashiyama-Sanjo Station -- Heianjingu-mae Station -- (Okazaki-michi Station) -- Keage Station (Keihan)
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Higashiyama-Sanjo Station - Heianjingu-mae Station - (Okazaki-michi Station) - Keage Station (Keihan)
sen.cmt: ハイフンを一つ削除しました。
